name: Japanese Red Dragon Better Version (Theme Pack)
description:
*IMPORTANT*

This is a pack. So you need to download all themes for best look. (Only works in dark mode)

1- This theme [Japanese Red Dragon Better Version (Theme Pack)]
2- https://userstyles.org/styles/252566/rounded-corners-for-roblox
3- https://userstyles.org/styles/212547/red-black-play-button-roblox
4- https://userstyles.org/styles/255206/red-dragon-transparent-i-edit-it-for-myself

LASTLY INSTALL THIS- https://userstyles.org/styles/218190/roblox-onebullet360-theme-ob360

(Optional) This makes roblox laggy but looks better if you want you can use it: https://userstyles.org/styles/184772/roblox-areo-roblox-aqua
